*****Netherlands KVM Linux VPS*****​

Leasedlayer Netherlands KVM VPS Hosting takes performance and reliability to the next level! Perfect Web hosting Solution for websites and web applications expecting fast growth and require an isolated hosting environment. Our KVM Linux VPS nodes are located in TIER III+ Evoswitch Datacenter in Amsterdam, Netherlands. We offer 1st 30 day Unconditional MoneyBack Guarantee* on VPS hosting service.

Features:

  • KVM Platform - Flexible, Secured and Low overhead.
  • Full Control - Root Access over SSH(Secure Shell).
  • High Volume Network - 1Gbit/s Unmetered Burstable Network.
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee - Maximum Available SLA.
  • DDOS Protection -Avoid Network attacks and vulnerabilities.
  • Setup Time: Instant
